overview: Sanjay Nath has over 15 years of entrepreneurial, business development, management consulting and operations experience. He spent 7 years between PwC Consulting and IBM Global Services’ Silicon Valley offices, advising and working closely with leading high tech clients like HP/ Compaq, Sun Microsystems, Intel and AT&T. Before his return to India in 2010, he co founded and ran a Legal Process Outsourcing (LPO) company. Sanjay has been a member of the Mumbai Angels, one of India’s leading angel groups, since its inception in 2006. He has made 8 investments across mobile, online travel, software, healthcare. Sanjay was an early investor in InMobi (formerly mKhoj), one of India’s best known angel-funded success stories.
